about.title: ABOUT GOOYOUNG
about.description: Gooyoung is a leading web development company dedicated to creating outstanding digital solutions. We specialize in modern web technologies and innovative design approaches.
about.service1Desc: We create responsive and dynamic web applications using the latest technologies and best practices.
about.service2Desc: Our design team crafts beautiful and intuitive user interfaces that engage and delight users.
about.service3Desc: We develop mobile-first applications that work seamlessly across all devices and platforms.
about.service4Desc: Our experts provide strategic consulting to help your business achieve digital transformation.

service1.title: Brand Website Development
service1.description: Custom-built exclusively for North American enterprises. We optimize for lightning-fast load speeds and SEO-friendly architecture, crafting a comprehensive brand presence that captures your audience from the first click.

service2.title: Full-Featured E-Commerce Platform
service2.description: Deep integration with payment gateways and inventory management systems. Built to handle high concurrent traffic with a smooth mobile-first experience that converts every visitor into a paying customer.

service3.title: Government Subsidy Technical Support
service3.description: Expert interpretation of CDAP, DMS and other digital transformation government subsidies. We deliver compliant technical implementation and guide your enterprise to maximize funding eligibility and amounts.

service4.title: AI-Powered Interaction Integration
service4.description: Deploy generative AI-driven intelligent customer service and automated workflows. Our large language models optimize efficiency and enable 24/7 unmanned business response capabilities.

service5.title: North American Growth Blueprint
service5.description: Precision SEO optimization aligned with local search behavior. We help your brand stand out on Google and social platforms, capturing high-quality local leads and driving sustainable growth.

service6.title: Enterprise-Grade Cloud Maintenance
service6.description: Bank-level data security and 24/7 monitoring services. Your digital assets remain fortified against any potential threat, maintaining peak stability under heavy load and emerging vulnerabilities.

contact.title: GET IN TOUCH
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how Gooyoung can help bring your ideas to life.
contact.name: Your Name

projects.title: OUR AWESOME PROJECTS
projects.description: A selection of portfolio projects showcasing our expertise in e-commerce platforms, business websites, and digital solutions across various industries.

hero.title: 欢迎来到古鹰网络
hero.subtitle: 专业的网站开发解决方案

about.title: 关于古鹰网络
about.description: 古鹰网络是一家领先的网站开发公司，致力于创建卓越的数字解决方案。我们专注于现代网络技术和创新的设计方法。
about.service1Desc: 我们使用最新的技术和最佳实践创建响应式和动态的网络应用。
about.service2Desc: 我们的设计团队创意美观和直观的用户界面，让用户享受愉悦的体验。
about.service3Desc: 我们开发移动优先的应用程序，在所有设备和平台上无缝运行。
about.service4Desc: 我们的专家提供战略咨询，帮助您的业务实现数字化转型。

service1.title: 品牌官方网站开发
service1.description: 专为北美本地企业定制，兼顾极致的加载速度与 SEO 友好型架构。全方位塑造您的品牌线上第一印象。

service2.title: 全功能网络商城
service2.description: 深度整合支付网关与库存管理系统。支持高并发访问，提供流畅移动体验，将流量精准转化为订单。

service3.title: 政府补贴技术支持
service3.description: 专业解读 CDAP、DMS 等数字化政府补贴政策。提供合规技术实施方案，协助企业获取最高额度资金。

service4.title: AI 智能交互集成
service4.description: 接入生成式 AI 智能客服与自动化工作流。通过大模型优化服务效率，实现 24/7 无人值守业务响应。

service5.title: 北美市场增长方案
service5.description: 结合本地搜索习惯的精准 SEO 优化。我们协助您在 Google 与社交媒体中脱颖而出，获取本地高质量客源。

service6.title: 企业级云端维护
service6.description: 提供银行级数据安全防护与全天候监控。确保您的数字资产在任何潜在威胁下依然稳如磐石。

contact.description: 有项目想法？让我们讨论古鹰网络如何帮助您将想法变成现实。
